name: UniBee
short_desc: Open-source universal billing software for SaaS businesses
author: UniBee-Billing
description: UniBee is an open-source universal billing solution designed specifically for SaaS businesses. It offers subscription management, automated invoicing, billable metrics tracking, product and plan management, webhooks, user management, reporting, transaction management, and discount management. UniBee provides a user-friendly and cost-effective alternative to expensive platforms like Recurly, Chargebee, and Paddle.
